title: Spacious, Affordable & luxury apartments for rent.  No broker
posting_body: ['NO BROKER FEE APARTMENTS', 'Q', 'UEENS', 'in most neighborhoods are now renting Cozy Studios renting from $1,000, One Bedroom renting from $1,100, two bedrooms renting from $1650, three bedrooms renting from $2000, and low income renting from $800.', 'These are', 'NO BROKER FEE', 'apartments close to transportations.', 'Most apartments are newly renovated with wood floors, tiled Bathroom with a Tub.', 'Three Walk-in Closets on average, Oversize Bedrooms with Double Windows.', 'Enjoy the Conveniences of a Live-In Super in most buildings.', 'Heat & Hot Water are included in some units.', 'Cat & dog friendly in some buildings.', ' VISIT', 'WWW.NYCURBANAPARTMENTS.COM', 'Vouchers, Low credit scores, low income are ok in some units.', 'But that will depend on management and requirements may vary.', 'We been in business for over 12 years.', '\xa0 We help our clients find no-broker fee apartments, get prepared and connect with no broker fee owners.', 'Same day viewing is possible depending on your preferences.', '- Students OK', '- Pet friendly OK', '- No credit/Low credit ok with guarantor OK.', "- Gov't assist supplement", 'Ok', '(', "If \tyou can't get one, we can refer you to a third party company that can be \tyour guarantor).", 'TO GET STARTED YOU MUST MAKE A VIRTUAL OR IN-PERSON APPOINTMENT TO BRING IN YOUR DOCUMENTS:', '- PROOF OF INCOME,', '- ID AND', '- CREDIT SCORE (Good or bad)', 'IN DIGITAL FORMAT ONLY.', 'VISIT', 'WWW.NYCURBANAPARTMENTS.COM', 'OR CALL.', 'NO TEXT.', '347.797.2787', 'Please follow the instructions and steps on the website carefully to get started.', '\xa0 <URL>', 'Astoria', 'Astoria Heights', 'Ditmars', 'Steinway', 'Little Egypt', 'Jackson Heights', 'Long Island City', 'Blissville', 'Hunters Point', 'Dutch Kills',
